## Proposed Timeline

We will update the following Gantt chart an necessary as we complete various tasks outlined in the above work plan.

```{r, echo=FALSE}

gt_object <- read.gantt("gantt.csv") 

plot(gt_object,event.label='Submit Final Materials',event.time='2023-12-01',
     col.event=c("red"),
     col.done=c("blue"),
     col.notdone=c("darkgreen"),
     main="Tier 2: Freq-Bayes Gantt Chart"
     )

legend("topright", pch=22, pt.cex=2, cex=0.9, pt.bg=c("blue", "darkgreen"),
     border="black",
     legend=c("Completed", "Incomplete"), bg="white", xpd=TRUE)
```
